    • Method Detail

      • getDynamicSignatureTemplateId

        public static int getDynamicSignatureTemplateId(SecureString challenge)
                                         throws InvalidDigitChecksumException
        Get the Dynamic Signature template ID encoded by the challenge.
        Parameters:
        challenge - The challenge of the transaction, must be non-null.
        Returns:
        The template ID indicating the list of input to request from the user for Dynamic Signature, -1 if there is no template coded in the challenge
        Throws:
        InvalidDigitChecksumException - When the challenge has an incorrect check digit

      • checkDigit

        public static boolean checkDigit(DsFormattingTools.VerifyType mode,
                                 SecureString challenge)
        Check validity of a challenge against a checksum mode.
        Parameters:
        mode - Checksum algorithm to use, DsFormattingTools.VerifyType define list of supported modes
        challenge -
        Returns:
        true if the checksum is correct
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When verify type or the challenge is invalid
